segments.text: I see the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me really disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t slipped yet with all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me sick to my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it’s totally normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, but I also don’t want to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t anyone doing anything about this?
segments.speaker: PAR
